name: Donuts
author: Janet Welter
instructions: Dissolve yeast in warm water. Add sugar, shortening, salt, egg and 2 cups of flour. Mix with mixer until smooth. Add the other 2 cups of flour and mix by hand. Cover and let rise, in a warm place, until double in size. Punch down, roll out on lightly floured board and cut into donuts. Place on a cooke sheet, cover and let rise again. Deep fry in shortening at 375Â°. Drain on paper towels.
